Initial Release

This is a placeholder entry. The appcast will be automatically updated when the first release is published via GitHub Actions.

Features

  • Work item creation and editing with markdown support
  • Dynamic text editor with collapsible UI
  • Dark/light theme support
  • Core Data persistence
  • Real-time text formatting and preview
